arts.sum: The winger was already on a booking when he celebrated his Ross County winner with the fans

arts.ttl: Philippe Clement explains why Vaclav Cerny celebrated goal with him on touchline as he delivers Ianis Hagi red card verdict
arts.sum: Philippe Clement has opened up on Ianis Hagi's red card moment as his big return to action was ended prematurely. The Rangers gaffer turned to the Romania international at the start of the second half with the Ibrox crowd giving the returning attacking midfielder a loud and warm reception as he made his way on for the second 45 minutes.

arts.ttl: Philippe Clement reacts to Ianis Hagi red card as he reveals why Vaclav Cerny celebrated goal with him
arts.sum: The Light Blues bounced back from their defeat to Lyon by dumping St Johnstone 2-0 at Ibrox.

arts.sum: Simo Valakari viewed his first game as Saints boss from the directorsâ€™ box while waiting for a work permit.

arts.sum: The winger produced a stunning piece of skill to nutmeg Sven Sprangler before curing a fine effort into the bottom corner

arts.ttl: Rangers 0 St Johnstone 0 LIVE as Connor Barron drops out and Ianis Hagi back in the matchday squad
arts.sum: It's an unusual 8pm Sunday night showdown under the lights at Ibrox to round off the weekend action in the top flight

arts.ttl: Kris Boyd miffed by no Celtic red card as Rangers legend says 'rules must have changed'
arts.sum: Miffed Kris Boyd claims Celtic matchwinner Nicolas Kuhn was lucky to avoid a red card for his late goal celebration. And German winger Kuhn sparked wild scenes in the dying embers when he curled the ball past Ross Laidlaw and dived into the celebrating away crowd behind the goal.
